word: H1846 - דָּעַךְ - dâʻak - daw-ak' - Be extinct

sections.paragraph: to go out, to be extinguished, to dry up
a) (Qal) to go out, to be extinguished
b) (Niphal) to be made extinct, to be dried up
c) (Pual) to be extinguished, to be quenched
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to be extinguished; figuratively to expire or be dried up: - be extinct, consumed, put out, quenched.
